meta.title: RapidWhisper - Voice-to-Text Without Switching Windows
meta.description: RapidWhisper: voice input with a global hotkey, app-aware formatting, UI themes, and hands-free control for focused work.

hero.kicker: Free Voice-to-Text for Work and Twitch
hero.title: Speak. Get Ready-to-Paste Text.
hero.lead: RapidWhisper listens by hotkey, turns speech into text, and instantly formats it for the active app. Then you just paste the final result.

discord.description: News, feedback, support, and community chat.

theme_notes.default: Default: universal theme for daily work.
theme_notes.ocean: Ocean: cool palette for calm focus.
theme_notes.dusk: Dusk: evening contrast with soft accents.
theme_notes.retro: Retro: warm retro gradient and analog atmosphere.
theme_notes.neo: Neo: neon style with vivid contrast.
theme_notes.lime: Lime: energetic green accent and high visual tone.
theme_notes.terminal: Terminal Theme: modern CLI aesthetics with green terminal glow.

controls.title: Hotkeys and Hook Integrations Built Into the Design
controls.hooks_intro: Python hooks plug into pipeline stages and provide flexible automation: text cleanup, service prefixes, external scripts, and integrations for your workflow.
controls.hooks_example_html: Small example: a hook on transcription_received cleans dictation, adds the Jarvis: prefix, and sends output to an external notification script. This is how you build a personal "Jarvis" for specific tasks.

cards.title: Dictation without window switching
cards.desc: Start recording, speak, and paste text right where you are working.

steps: Hotkey opens the floating window and starts recording.
Waveform and status update in real time.
Result goes to clipboard + post-processing hooks.
